name: v2.0292
title: v2 Vaccines Administered
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0292 ( Vaccines Administered)

property.description: A property that indicates the status of the concept. One of active, experimental, deprecated, retired
The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged
